item.title: One Year Since Quitting Facebook
item.description: Use of FB in daily lives Since it’s free to sign up and use its services, Facebook has been popular for many Filipinos from all walks of life. Here they get updates from friends and non-friends, from relatives, from celebrities, and even from the news. It has become its own social news aggregate. Users provide the data, such as date of birth, school last attended, the things they like or don’t like, etc.
